title: Father Of Day, Father Of Night
lastfmSummary: Lyrics (Bob Dylan) Father of night, Father of day, Father, who take the darkness away, Father, who teache's the bird to fly, Builder of rainbows up in the sky, Father of day,Father of night, Father of black, Father of white, Father, who build the mountain so high, Who shapeth the cloud up in the sky, Father of lonelyness and paine Father of night,Father of day, instrumental play Father of grain, Father of wheat, Father of cold and Father of heat, Read more on Last.fm.
